    • formatVertically

      private java.lang.String formatVertically​(int n, int level)
      Formats the tree with indentation to show level. This is NOT the way you see heaps in a text, but it is common to show nested and recursive structures this way.
      Parameters:
      n - index into the heap
      level - depth of recursion
      Returns:
      a String representing this node and below

    • formatAsTree

      public java.lang.String formatAsTree()
      Returns a representation of the heap in the form one usually sees. It looks like a tree with the root centered on the first line.
      Returns:
      the heap as a tree
